envelopes.name: Policy Risk Assessment
assumptions: Risk models trained on historical claims data and actuarial tables.
Assessments consider geographical, demographic, and behavioral factors.
Underwriters review AI recommendations for policies exceeding thresholds.
constraints: No use of protected characteristics (race, religion, etc.) in risk scoring
High-risk classifications require human underwriter justification
Rate recommendations must align with state regulatory limits

envelopes.name: Claims Triage & Fraud Detection
assumptions: Fraud detection balances false positives with loss prevention.
Automated triage speeds legitimate claims processing.
Pattern analysis identifies suspicious claim networks.
constraints: Fraud flags must include specific indicators for adjuster review
Never auto-deny claims — only recommend further investigation
Claimants notified of delays within 48 hours

envelopes.name: Premium Pricing & Quote Generation
assumptions: Dynamic pricing reflects real-time risk assessment and market conditions.
Discount eligibility is transparent and consistently applied.
Price optimization balances competitiveness with profitability.
constraints: Premium increases limited to 15% per renewal without review
Quotes valid for 30 days from generation
Discounts must not create discriminatory pricing patterns

envelopes.name: Regulatory Compliance & Reporting
assumptions: Automated compliance checks against state and federal regulations.
Model fairness testing detects disparate impact before deployment.
Audit trails maintain 10-year retention for regulatory inquiries.
constraints: All AI-driven decisions must be explainable to regulators
Quarterly fairness audits required for risk models
Material model changes require actuarial sign-off

agents.name: ModelAuditor
agents.role: fairness testing and disparate impact analysis

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Policy risk assessment envelope (REV-INS-001-D) activated with enhanced fairness constraints.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Claims triage and fraud detection envelope (REV-INS-002-C) activated with updated pattern recognition.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Regulatory compliance and reporting envelope activated for Q1 audit cycle.

events.label: Auto insurance policy assessed
events.detail: RiskScorer evaluated new auto policy application. Risk score: 72/100 (standard risk). Recommended rate: $1,240/year.

events.label: High-risk application escalated
events.detail: ThresholdEscalator flagged homeowner's policy with risk score 89/100 (elevated flood risk + prior claims). Routed to senior underwriter.

events.label: Underwriter approved with conditions
events.detail: Senior underwriter accepted policy with flood mitigation requirement (sump pump installation). Premium adjusted to $2,850/year.

events.label: Auto claim fast-tracked
events.detail: ClaimTriager assessed minor fender-bender claim. Low complexity, clear liability. Approved for automated processing ($1,850 payout).

events.label: Fraud indicators detected
events.detail: FraudDetector flagged claim for further investigation: 3 prior claims in 18 months, inconsistent damage timeline, repair shop flagged in network.

events.label: Envelope promoted
events.detail: Premium pricing and quote generation envelope (REV-INS-003-B) activated with market competitiveness tracking.

events.label: Bundle discount applied
events.detail: DiscountEvaluator identified customer eligible for multi-policy discount (auto + home). Quote reduced from $3,200 to $2,720/year (15% savings).

events.label: Claim investigation completed
events.detail: Claims adjuster reviewed fraud-flagged case. Evidence validated claim legitimacy. Prior claims were different vehicles. Claim approved for $4,200 payout.

events.label: Model fairness audit complete
events.detail: ModelAuditor ran disparate impact analysis on risk scoring. No significant disparities detected across protected groups. Gini coefficient: 0.03 (threshold: 0.10).

events.label: Premium increase exceeds threshold
events.detail: QuoteGenerator calculated 18% renewal increase due to claims history. Exceeds 15% limit — escalated to pricing review.

events.label: Exception approved
events.detail: Pricing Steward approved 18% increase with customer notification and retention offer (accident forgiveness program).

events.label: DSG: Risk model calibration
events.detail: Underwriting Stewardship Group reviewed 247 high-risk escalations. Adjusted risk score thresholds for coastal properties.

events.label: Risk threshold adjusted
events.detail: Underwriting Steward updated high-risk escalation threshold from 85 to 88 after DSG review. Reduces false escalations while maintaining safety margins.
events.reason: Refine escalation criteria to focus underwriter attention on truly complex cases.

events.label: Explainability gap identified
events.detail: ExplainabilityEngine flagged 3 high-risk denials with insufficient justification documentation. Routed to compliance review.

events.label: Claims processing metrics
events.detail: Fast-track claims: 68% auto-processed. Fraud detection precision: 87%. Average investigation time: 4.2 days (target: <5 days).

events.label: Regulatory report submitted
events.detail: RegulatoryChecker compiled quarterly compliance report for state insurance commission. 0 violations detected, 3 minor process improvements recommended.

events.label: Risk assessment embedded
events.detail: Underwriting decision with conditions stored for similar property risk profiles.
events.semanticContext: homeowner policy approval with flood mitigation requirements

events.label: Fraud pattern embedded
events.detail: Fraud indicator network pattern stored for future claim investigations.
events.semanticContext: fraud detection patterns for multiple claims and repair shop networks

events.label: DSG calibration embedded
events.detail: Risk model threshold adjustments from stewardship review stored for future reference.
events.semanticContext: underwriting risk threshold calibration for coastal properties

events.label: Market competitiveness report
events.detail: CompetitivenessMonitor: Company rates 8% below market average for standard risk, 12% above for high risk. Conversion rate: 34% (industry: 28%).

events.label: Underwriting summary
events.detail: Policies issued: 1,847. Auto-approved: 72%. Escalated: 28%. Average turnaround: 2.1 days. Loss ratio projection: 62% (target: <65%).
